Reviews.Title: Great security
Reviews.Author: RWL
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a great outdoor camera with lots of features, and able to see from anywhere you have a computer or internet access, this is the camera for you. I love this camera, and it is well worth the price. It has a slot for an SD card, and works great with POE. Would definately buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew Greenfield
Reviews.Content: Camera works very nicely-- careful planning is key.  I have been looking at other cameras for the last 6 months and none of them come close to this image quality, of course you PAY for it, but it survived the AZ summer and gives zero issues...

ProductInfo.Name: AXIS COMMUNICATIONS P3367-VE FIXED VANDAL DOME, OU Home Security
